Lv. 40 skills increase Lv. 40 skills' cooldown recovery +15% when cast.

options.explain:
Applies the following, depending on the total of Attack Speed options (+/-) on your equipped armor, accessories, and Special Equipment.
- 100 to below 120%: Skill Atk. +10%
- 120 to below 140%: Skill Atk. +20%
- 140% or more: Skill Atk. +30%
options.explainDetail:
Applies the following, depending on the total of Attack Speed options (+/-) on your equipped armor, accessories, and Special Equipment. (Avatars, emblems, gems, Creatures, and titles included)
- 100 to below 120%: Skill Atk. +10%
- 120 to below 140%: Skill Atk. +20%
- 140% or more: Skill Atk. +30%
